H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H403.def: = marker used to affirm the truth of the following statement

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H898.def: = pattern of behavior by which humans act in a way which shows a lack of truthfulness and commitment, both in words and deeds

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H8469.def: = to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else; ◄ by approaching that person in a very humble way

H5753.def: = causative action by which deities change the shape of an object ► with the purpose of destroying it

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H7726.def: = a person or group that has turned away from someone they had pledged to serve

H7495.def: = causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans or animals to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself; ≈ often used figuratively to denote the state of a country or nation suffering from the consequences of their unfaithfulness

H4878.def: = process by which people turn away from someone they had pledged to serve

H857.def: = to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H403.def: = marker used to affirm the truth of the following statement

H8267.def: = state in which humans are not committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H1995.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, sometimes associated with natural phenomena like heavy rain and the waves of a stormy sea

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H8668.def: = causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1322.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H3018.def: = action by which humans are engaged in laborious work which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H7901.def: = state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

H1322.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H3639.def: = state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done

H3680.def: = state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H587.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

2.gl: to lie down in > to accept
